about_the_game:
Advanced Equipment Set



Ujirochi Coat x1
Purma Shirt x1
Morfel Coat x1
Ankanara Boots x1
Ichinoral Oxfords x1
Mashulare Boots x1

*Rare Advanced Equipment for Lin, Roger and Sonia.
*Low chance of being dropped from enemies.
*If you have already obtained this equipment, you will receive a Premium Material instead.
detailed_description:
Advanced Equipment Set



Ujirochi Coat x1
Purma Shirt x1
Morfel Coat x1
Ankanara Boots x1
Ichinoral Oxfords x1
Mashulare Boots x1

*Rare Advanced Equipment for Lin, Roger and Sonia.
*Low chance of being dropped from enemies.
*If you have already obtained this equipment, you will receive a Premium Material instead.

name: Echo - Advanced Equipment Set

subs.option_text: 回音 - 稀有高級裝備套組 - $2.99 $2.39 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
